example: An abundant supply of food. (充足的食物供應。)
The country has abundant natural resources. (該國擁有豐富的自然資源。)
fillInTheBlankExamples: Our school garden has _____ flowers in spring. (我們學校的花園在春天有丰富的的花朵。)
The forest is home to _____ wildlife. (這片森林是大量的野生動物的家園。)
Rainfall has been _____ this year, leading to good harvests. (今年的降雨量很充足，帶來了豐收。)

example: It was a fascinating story. (這是一個引人入勝的故事。)
The history of ancient Egypt is truly fascinating. (古埃及的歷史確實很迷人。)
fillInTheBlankExamples: The documentary about deep-sea creatures was truly _____. (關於深海生物的紀錄片真是太迷人了。)
She found his research on quantum physics incredibly _____. (她發現他關於量子物理學的研究極其吸引人的。)
Learning about different cultures can be a very _____ experience. (了解不同的文化可能是一種非常吸引人的體驗。)

example: Be careful, the vase is fragile. (小心，花瓶很易碎。)
The country's economy is in a fragile state. (該國經濟處於脆弱狀態。)
fillInTheBlankExamples: Handle with care; the glassware is very _____. (請小心處理；玻璃器皿非常易碎。)
The peace agreement proved to be _____ and quickly broke down. (和平協議被證明是脆弱的，很快就破裂了。)
The bird's nest was so _____ that a strong wind could destroy it. (鳥巢如此脆弱，一陣強風就能把它毀了。)

definition: 有彈性的；能迅速恢復的；韧性
example: She's a resilient person who bounces back quickly. (她是一個很快就能恢復的堅韌的人。)
The material is highly resilient to wear and tear. (這種材料非常耐磨損。)
fillInTheBlankExamples: Despite many setbacks, the community proved to be incredibly _____. (儘管遇到許多挫折，社區仍表現出令人難以置信的韧性。)
Rubber is a very _____ material. (橡膠是一種非常有韧性的材料。)
Children are often more _____ than adults when facing challenges. (孩子們在面對挑戰時通常比成年人更坚韧。)
